courses.title: Beginner Guitar Lessons
courses.description: Learn the basics of guitar, including chords, strumming, and simple songs.

courses.title: Advanced Piano Techniques
courses.description: Master advanced piano skills such as arpeggios, improvisation, and performance techniques.

courses.title: Music Production with FL Studio
courses.description: A complete guide to producing, mixing, and mastering music using FL Studio.

courses.title: Vocal Training for Beginners
courses.description: Enhance your singing skills with voice control, pitch, and breathing techniques.

courses.title: DJ Mixing Essentials
courses.description: Learn the art of DJing with beat matching, transitions, and live performance tips.

courses.title: Electronic Music Fundamentals
courses.description: Understand the basics of electronic music, synthesizers, and sound design.

courses.title: Tabla for Beginners
courses.description: Learn traditional Indian rhythms and tabla playing techniques.

courses.title: Music Theory Essentials
courses.description: Gain a strong foundation in scales, chords, harmony, and rhythm.

courses.title: Violin Masterclass
courses.description: Take your violin skills to the next level with advanced bowing and fingering techniques.

courses.title: Sound Engineering Basics
courses.description: Learn recording, mixing, and audio editing for professional sound production.
